title: Petrol unavailable for next two days - Energy Minister
body_lines: Minister of Power and Energy Kanchana Wijesekara has requested the general public to refrain from waiting in queues to obtain petrol as supplies are unavailable for the next two days.
Addressing today’s parliamentary session, the lawmaker pledged to resolve the issue this weekend.
However, diesel stocks will be supplied continuously, Minister Wijesekara said further.
